localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Want to replace annoying SMS 2FA codes? We verify your users by the way they type 4 words. This improves UX significantly and reduces costs by an order of magnitude. Btw: you can get the solution free of charge for a limited time. Check the website for more.
nodes.title: TypingDNA Verify - Replace SMS 2FA codes with better UX: just type 4 words
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: A playful, yellow page themed directory of brands that shows you which tools brands are using.
nodes.title: 1-800-D2C - See which tools are powering the best D2Cs
nodes.author: Tim Masek

nodes.excerpt: Do you find yourself digging through email threads trying to find the version of a contract in which a specific change was introduced? Who proposed the change? Was it your lawyer, or your customer? If this pain is familiar, Version Story is here to help.
nodes.title: Version Story - Git for lawyers
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

nodes.excerpt: Charge Running is a mobile app that provides live running classes with others from all over the world! Trainers will update you on your stats and interact with you and your fellow runners in our real-time chat room.
nodes.title: Charge Running - Social running app with real-time coaching
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Highlight your Clubhouse event in social media. Paste the link of your event, and get a neat preview page you can share online.
nodes.title: Flipp for Clubhouse - Highlight your Clubhouse event on social media

nodes.excerpt: End-to-end spend management for companies in LatAm. Issue unlimited physical or virtual cards, set limits for each, get real-time visibility of your teamâ€™s spend, and save valuable time on tedious tasks like invoice matching.
nodes.title: Clara - Clear, simplified spend management for companies in LatAm

nodes.excerpt: This cloud-based tool will help you analyze your Facebook profile by providing detailed info on who is engaging with your posts! Find who is inactive and delete them with a few clicks. Easily automate friend's request process.

nodes.excerpt: Send every customer a personalized onboarding checklist, with automated email reminders, assigned tasks, and a lot more. Upgrade that dusty spreadsheet and onboarding process you no longer love. Onboard your next customer with Arrows.
nodes.title: Arrows - Collaborative onboarding for high-touch customers
nodes.author: Hiten Shah

nodes.excerpt: Use data from your APIs, databases, or integrations to empower every team to grow your businessâ€™s bottom-line. Leverage OKRs and KPIs to cultivate a culture of accountability, transparency, and autonomy by focusing on your outcomes, not outputs.
nodes.title: Commonality - Turn your data into real results with KPIs and OKRs

nodes.excerpt: Tally is a new type of form builder. Just start typing and build forms for all purposes in seconds. Without knowing how to code, and for free!
nodes.title: Tally - The simplest way to create forms for free
nodes.author: Filip Minev

nodes.excerpt: B2B buyers are tired of the traditional sales process and want a B2C like buying experience. Deal Rooms transform your sales process to sell B2B buyers how they want to be sold. Open to close, deal rooms help your sales teams sell more and sell fast.
nodes.title: Referenceable - Deal rooms create B2C like buying experiences for B2B buyers
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: WellBuddy is a smart wellbeing tool that makes it easy and simple to focus on your health at work. â € It integrates with your calendar and monitors and schedules physical and mental health breaks when youâ€™re free so you can think, feel and perform better.
nodes.title: WellBuddy - Helping you find time to focus on your wellbeing at work
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Airdocs is a document generation service for Airtable. Create smart, beautiful-looking documents from your data. The drag-and-drop designer gives you ultimate control of your documents. Send your documents to another app or store them back in Airtable.
nodes.title: Airdocs - Generate documents from Airtable
nodes.author: Josh Mamroud

nodes.excerpt: A new, flexible way to design your viral referral campaigns: we've just released a drag & drop page builder into UpViral, the platform to help grow your email list faster.
nodes.title: UpViral - Grow your email list faster using referral marketing
nodes.author: Wilco de Kreij

nodes.excerpt: Milk Video is a web app for marketers to turn webinars into designed video highlights in minutes. Effortlessly clip, caption, and design recordings to share the best moments in engaging videos. YC W21
nodes.title: Milk Video - Turn webinars into designed video highlights in minutes

nodes.excerpt: Avo takes the busywork out of analytics with a guided workflow that catches errors and syncs across your existing tools (including Amplitude and Mixpanel). For people who are tired of spending more time managing their data than building great products.
nodes.title: Avo for PMs - Error proof your analytics
nodes.author: Stefania Olafsdottir

nodes.excerpt: Vidjet is a smart video player for websites. It uses a popup format to display videos, so you can segment and trigger them to your visitors. â € It's also the easiest and fastest way to publish videos on a website! ğŸš€
nodes.title: Vidjet - Popup-video player for websites

nodes.excerpt: All-In-One property management and sales automation platform for independent hotels and vacation rentals. We also help our properties upsell unsold rooms and amenities in a completely automated way via guest messaging and direct sales on website.
nodes.title: Stayflexi - Modern operating system for hotels and vacation rentals
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: With Versoly changelog you can add custom fonts, analytics, custom domain, embeddable widget, SEO (pagination, sitemap, metatags) and give your whole team access.
nodes.title: Changelog by Versoly - Free changelog for your product updates
nodes.author: Volkan Kaya

nodes.excerpt: Mango Table is three-dimensional project management service. Our service focuses on expressing three-dimensional relationships, such as inclusion relationship, priority, etc, and visualizing projects in progress concurrently. Get more information from our https://mangotable.me.
nodes.title: Mango Table - Visual, hierarchical, relationship-oriented project manager
nodes.author: Changhoi Kim

nodes.excerpt: Inbox Flows is a huge and growing library of emails from top brands that helps you research competitors and trends in your industry so you have a better idea of how to stand out in inboxes.
nodes.title: Inbox Flows - Research and compare emails from top brands & competitors
nodes.author: Ramy

nodes.excerpt: A complete APIs suite for your software development, and business to power-up. You don't have to go anywhere, single marketplace for all the APIs & third-party API integrations.
nodes.title: DEV APIs - Powerful apis for your business to grow.
nodes.author: Mohd Danish

nodes.excerpt: Say goodbye to alt-tabbing for scattered resources and "productivity" tools TODAY. Typedâ is your one-and-only document workspace that streamlines research, drafting, communication and knowledge management. If Google Drives you crazy, get Typedâ now.
nodes.title: Typedâ Beta - Google Docs on Steroids
nodes.author: Trevor Owens

nodes.excerpt: Progressive Web Apps (PWAs) are cutting-edge websites that behave like native apps. They're installable, fast, work offline, and open in their own native window. Pep turns your existing website into a PWA in one line of code.
nodes.title: Pep - Turn your site into a fast, installable Progressive Web App
nodes.author: Chris Messina
